report.title: Darwin Core occurrences for NBN Atlas (standard filters)
report.description: A list of occurrences in Darwin Core format with NBN Atlas specific columns.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf ON onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa t ON t.id=ttl.taxon_id AND t.deleted=false JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=o.sample_id LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values vdatasetID JOIN sample_attributes adatasetID ON adatasetID.id=vdatasetID.sample_attribute_id AND adatasetID.term_name='datasetID' ) ON vdatasetID.sample_id=o.sample_id AND vdatasetID.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: dataset_name
param.description: Name of the dataset to populate into Dwc datasetName.

param.name: rights_holder
param.description: A person or organisation owning or managing rights over the resource.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occurrence_id_prefix
param.description: Prefix added to the Indicia record ID when constructing the output DwC occurrenceID field. Typically the URL of a record details page with an incomplete record ID parameter.

column.name: scientificName
column.sql: CASE cttl.language_iso WHEN 'lat' THEN cttl.taxon || COALESCE(' ' || cttl.authority, '') ELSE cttl.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' ' || cttl.preferred_authority, '') END

column.name: vernacularName
column.sql: CASE cttl.language_iso WHEN 'lat' THEN null ELSE cttl.taxon END

column.name: eventDate
coordinateUncertaintyInMeters
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.sensitive=true OR snf.privacy_precision IS NOT NULL OR snf.entered_sref_system NOT SIMILAR TO '[0-9]+' THEN get_sref_precision(onf.output_sref, onf.output_sref_system, null) ELSE COALESCE(snf.attr_sref_precision, 50) END

column.name: gridReference
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.sensitive=true OR snf.privacy_precision IS NOT NULL OR snf.entered_sref_system NOT SIMILAR TO '[0-9]+' THEN onf.output_sref ELSE null END

column.name: decimalLatitude
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.sensitive=true OR snf.privacy_precision IS NOT NULL OR snf.entered_sref_system NOT SIMILAR TO '[0-9]+' THEN null ELSE st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) END

column.name: decimalLongitude
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.sensitive=true OR snf.privacy_precision IS NOT NULL OR snf.entered_sref_system NOT SIMILAR TO '[0-9]+' THEN null ELSE st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) END

column.name: collectionCode
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(snf.survey_title FROM 1 FOR LENGTH(snf.website_title)) = snf.website_title THEN trim(substring(snf.survey_title FROM LENGTH(snf.website_title)+1)) ELSE snf.survey_title END

column.name: identificationVerificationStatus
column.sql: CASE o.record_status || COALESCE(o.record_substatus::text, '') WHEN 'V' THEN 'Accepted' WHEN 'V1' THEN 'Accepted - correct' WHEN 'V2' THEN 'Accepted - considered correct' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Unconfirmed - not reviewed' WHEN 'C3' THEN 'Unconfirmed - plausible' ELSE null END
